import React, {Component} from 'react' import Alert from './Alert' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' export default class Registro extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state ={ guardar: this.props.guardar, valid: false } } static propTypes = { guardar: PropTypes.func.isRequired } //TODO crear refs EventRef = React.createRef(); TypeRef = React.createRef(); StartRef = React.createRef(); DurationRef = React.createRef(); FinalRef = React.createRef(); CreateAppoinment = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const newAppoinment = { event: this.DocumentRef.current.value, type: this.namesRef.current.value, start: this.lastNameRef.current.value, duration: this.dateRef.current.value, final: this.HourRef.current.value } newAppoinment.start && newAppoinment.event ? this.state.guardar(newAppoinment) : this.setState({valid: true}) } render(){ const {valid} = this.state return(

Nuevo Evento

{valid && }

{Final}

) } }
